mapper.insert:
insert into wiki (title, blank, `desc`, content, img, url, type_id) VALUES
(#{item.title},#{item.blank},#{item.desc},#{item.content},#{item.img} ,#{item.url},#{item.typeId})
mapper.select: select title, blank, `desc`, content, img, url from wiki where title like concat('%',#{words},'%')
